headline: PTC FlexPLM to Strengthen SPG Company's Licensed Product Operations
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that SPG Company, a global leader in licensed product design, development, manufacturing, and distribution, has selected PTC's FlexPLM® retail product lifecycle management (PLM) solution to modernize and support its end-to-end product lifecycle operations. With FlexPLM, SPG will replace its legacy PLM system with a scalable, cloud-based platform designed to support faster development cycles and more consistent product data.

content.title: PTC FlexPLM to Strengthen SPG Company's Licensed Product Operations
content.summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that SPG Company, a global leader in licensed product design, development, manufacturing, and distribution, has selected PTC's FlexPLM® retail product lifecycle management (PLM) solution to modernize and support its end-to-end product lifecycle operations. With FlexPLM, SPG will replace its legacy PLM system with a scalable, cloud-based platform designed to support faster development cycles and more consistent product data.
